content.rendered:
Directed by Parker Finn

Written by Parker Finn

Star Sosie Bacon(Rose Cotter). Kyle Gallner(Joel). Jessie T. Usher(Trevor). Robin Weigert(Dr. Madeline Northcott). Caitlin Stasey(Laura Weaver). Kal Penn(Dr. Morgan Desai). Rob Morgan(Robert Talley). Gillian Zinser(Holly). Judy Reyes(Victoria Muñoz). Jack Sochet(Carl Renken). Nick Arapoglou(Greg). Perry Strong(Detective Buckley). Matthew Lamb(Jackson). Dora Kiss(Mom). Meghan Brown Pratt(10 Year Old Rose (as Meghan Pratt Brown)). Jared Johnston(Orderly Dan). Ura Yoana Sánchez(Nurse Wanda). Vanessa Cozart(Nurse). Shu Q(Officer Chan). Shevy Gutierrez(Officer Wilkes). Sara Kapner(Stephanie). Steven Strickland(Deputy Sheriff). Kevin Keppy(Nightmare Mom). Marti Matulis(The Monstruosity). Mezi Atwood(Nurse (uncredited)). Irene Blackman(Nurse (uncredited)). Brandon Brigman(Security guard (uncredited)). Setty Brosevelt(Driver / Pedestrian (uncredited)). Steven Bullock(Cocktail party guests (uncredited)). Sebastian Deerkop(Bartender (uncredited)). Asia Hernandez(Middle Age Woman (uncredited)). Bob Leszczak(Pedestrian (uncredited)). Jerry Lobrow(Cocktail Party Guest (uncredited)). Felix Melendez Jr.(Gabriel Munoz (uncredited)). Michelle Persiano(Nurse (uncredited)). Nadia Ramdass(Nurse (uncredited)). Athena Smiley(Little girl (uncredited)). Scot Teller(Prison Guard (uncredited)). Joseph Tornatore(Prison guard (uncredited)). Rachel Yong(Brash Colleague (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Marty Bowen. Adam Fishbach. Wyck Godfrey. Isaac Klausner. Robert Salerno

Production Paramount Players. Temple Hill Entertainment
